landing.subTitle: Riding the Waves of Exceptional Installations and Water Park Services

services.title: Installation
services.content: Both “Only supervisor” or “ Full Scope Installation” services with our skilled and expert engineers, technicians and installers.

services.title: Expansion
services.content: Advising and supplying expansion parts for the current parks.

services.title: Renovation
services.content: Renewing the old parks with multiple solutions.

services.title: Maintenance
services.content: Periodical maintenance, re-painting ,re-locating services with our talented technicians and repairment.

services.title: Engineering
services.content: Design and calculations of the structures according to European Norms.

services.title: Consulting
services.content: Solving the troubles and advicing for new oppprtunities in the parks.

projects.subTitle: our projects presence across the globe

success.title: Welcome to Our Community!
success.message: Thank you for subscribing to our newsletter! You’re now on the list to receive the latest updates, and insights directly to your inbox.

error.title: Oops! Something Went Wrong
error.message: Unfortunately, we were unable to process your subscription at this time. Please check your email address and try again. If you continue to experience issues, don’t hesitate to contact us for assistance. Thank you for your understanding!

whyWe.title: Experience
whyWe.paragraph: Our entire staff has over ten years of expertise in the industry.

whyWe.title: Customer Care
whyWe.paragraph: We provide online customer service 24 hours a day, seven days a week, and we are a customer-focused, customer-satisfaction-oriented organization.

whyWe.title: Know How
whyWe.paragraph: With our skilled team, we are constantly ready to offer fresh ideas and consultation to our consumers.

whyWe.title: Quality
whyWe.paragraph: Our products, services, and materials are all of the highest quality.

whyWe.title: Competitive Prices
whyWe.paragraph: We provide high-quality service at reasonable prices.

whyWe.title: Warranty
whyWe.paragraph: Our services and goods are covered by a variety of warranties.

whyWe.title: Safety
whyWe.paragraph: Our top goal is the health and safety of people and the environment, as well as the long-term durability of our products.

companyVision.title: Vision
companyVision.paragraph: To become the most successful and recognised after-sales service company in the waterpark industry on a global scale.

companyMission.title: Mission
companyMission.paragraph: Waveast strives to meet its client's needs and safety with the greatest quality at reasonable rates, thanks to its highly qualified technical team.

companyPeople: Waveast Installation & Park Services was founded by two engineers with over ten years of industry experience. Additionally, Waveast has a global presence due to its dynamic technical team and strategic alliances with partners worldwide.
With a customer-focused after-sales team and competent designers and engineers, Waveast strives to provide the best service possible to its clients.
aboutCompany: Waveast Installation & Park Services is a leading company based in Warsaw, Poland, specializing in a wide range of services for amusement items and water parks. Since our establishment, we have been dedicated to providing exceptional engineering, installation, maintenance, expansion, renovation, and consultancy services.

Waveast, we take pride in our ability to cater to diverse clients, including hotels, waterparks, and individuals. Our skilled team excels in constructing various types of swimming pools and decorative pools, offering comprehensive solutions that include circulation, filtration, and all mechanical and electrical systems.

In addition to our exceptional services, Waveast also provides a wide selection of high-quality composite materials and plastic raw materials that meet industry standards. We understand the importance of using reliable and durable materials in every project. Moreover, our team of professional and talented engineers and technicians is committed to fulfilling our customers; requests with expertise and dedication.
servicesCompany: Waveast Installation & Park Services is a leading provider of comprehensive services for amusement items and water parks. With a strong commitment to excellence, we specialize in delivering exceptional engineering, installation, maintenance, expansion, renovation, and consultancy services.
projectsCompany: Waveast Installation & Park Services has successfully completed numerous projects around the world, showcasing our expertise in creating exceptional amusement items and water parks. Our global presence reflects our commitment to excellence and our ability to meet diverse client needs across various environments.
contactCompany: For all inquiries, use the contact form or reach out directly using the contact information provided below.

error.validSubject: Subject must be at least two characters
error.validMessage: Message must be at least two characters

success.title: Thank You for Reaching Out!
success.message: Your message has been sent successfully. We appreciate your interest and will get back to you as soon as possible.

error.title: Oops! Something Went Wrong
error.message: We encountered an error while trying to send your message. Please try again or reach out to us directly via our contact information.
